heroSubtitle: Our mission is to empower anyone who wants to become the best version of themselves—by cultivating character, unlocking potential, and achieving meaningful goals.
personalGrowthDesc: Discover yourself, build character, and reach your full potential.
valueImpactDesc: Learn to increase your value, contribute to your community, and make a difference.
goalAchievementDesc: Commit to actions that move you forward and help you reach your dreams.

acceuilPage.heroTitle: From ideas to solutions: technology, data, and insights that inspire.
acceuilPage.heroSubtitle: I build websites, desktop applications, and data-driven solutions — and I write articles to inspire lasting success.
acceuilPage.personalGrowthDesc: I share insights from personal experiences and books I read to help people stay motivated and build lasting habits for success.
acceuilPage.dataProjectsDesc: I use data to uncover stories, patterns, and solutions. My projects showcase how analysis can solve real-world problems.
acceuilPage.techSolutionsDesc: From websites to desktop apps, I create tools that make an impact and show how technology improves life.

aboutSection.title: About Me
aboutSection.text: I am a creator, developer, and data analyst passionate about solving real-life problems with technology. I write to inspire others through my personal journey and the knowledge I gain from books. This site is my space to showcase projects and share ideas that help people achieve lasting success.

acceuilPage.newsletterDesc: Subscribe to get my latest articles and updates on projects delivered straight to your inbox.
